entry.title: To Love-Ru Darkness Loli Imouto Paradise
entry.content:
Legendary ero-manga To Love-Ru Darkness continues, this time with a renewed focus on top-tier imouto Mikan, as well as another loli favorite, Momo Velia Deviluke.








The tankobon version (on the right) of the manga appears to be getting many subtle updates as well:

And just as he does every month, the anonymous To Love-Ru artist(s) have come out with more fine To Love-Ru Darkness colored editions:













In other news, a new edition of the original To Love-Ru manga is to be released this November, with some additional illustrations and the hoped-for possibility of the meticulous ero-upgrades the series is known for:

entry.title: Kousaka Kirino Cheeky Bikini Figure
entry.content:
Summer might be over, but this doesn’t seem to stop Kirino from putting on her bikini for some sexy times at the beach come the frigidity of January 2012, thanks to QuesQ.







Kirino can be pre-ordered now.

entry.title: Kuriyama Chiaki to team up with Shiina Ringo, Tokyo Jihen again for her new single
entry.content:
Actress/singer Kuriyama Chiaki will be releasing her new single entitled “Tsukiyo no Shouzou” on November 23rd.

“Tsukiyo no Shouzou” will be the latest collaboration work between Kuriyama and singer-songwriter Shiina Ringo after March’s “Oishii Kisetsu/Ketteiteki Sanpunkan“. Ringo will provide the lyrics and produce the song, while her band Tokyo Jihen will be in charge of the musical performance.

The song was already picked up as the theme song for Kuriyama’s upcoming drama, “Himitsu Chouhouin Erika“.

Stay tuned to tokyohive for more info on this upcoming release!

Source: natalie

entry.title: MIYAVI vs KREVA releases PV for “STRONG (Acoustic Battle ver.)”
entry.content:
MIYAVI and KREVA’s collaboration single, “STRONG“, was finally released today!

The music video for “STRONG” has gotten rave reviews from across the globe as it’s already reached over 200,000 views. Now, the music video for “STRONG (Acoustic Battle ver.)” has been uploaded onto MIYAVI’s official YouTube channel.

The video features MIYAVI and KREVA facing off in a black and white setting that’s rife with tension.

Both of these music videos will be included in the DVD for the limited edition of the single.

Check out the PV below!

Source: Barks

entry.title: Watarirouka Hashiritai 7 to release new single in November
entry.content:
AKB48 sub-unit Watarirouka Hashiritai 7 has just announced that they will be releasing a new single on November 30th!

The single is currently untitled, and details remain scarce. However, it’s been revealed that the title song will have a tie-up with a popular anime.

It’s also known that the single will come in four different versions: Limited Editions A, B, and C, as well as a regular CD-only Edition. All versions will contain a participation ticket for their nationwide handshake event.

Stay tuned for more details on this new single!

Source: natalie

entry.title: Superfly unveils PV for “Ai wo Kurae”
entry.content:
Superfly has finally released the PV for her upcoming single, “Ai wo Kurae“!

“Ai wo Kurae” is a rock number filled with positive energy, and serves as theme song for the upcoming movie, “Smuggler – Omae no Mirai wo Hakobe“.

The single is set for release on October 12th. In the meantime, check out the PV below!

entry.title: KFC Sues Obama Fried Chicken – “No You Can’t!”
entry.content:
Chinese media reports that Kentucky Fried Chicken is taking legal action against the management of “Obama Fried Chicken” on grounds of trademark infringement.

A store bearing the “OFC” livery – complete with Obama’s likeness replacing that of the Colonel – reportedly appeared in Beijing, causing rapid reverberations online and an almost equally rapid response from KFC proper, which vowed legal action.

The store was apparently the work of one of China’s notoriously innovative entrepreneurs, in this a case a university student, and had not yet opened.

This is not the first time KFC has had to deal with Chinese pretenders – previously it had to tackle “KFG”:

Other fast food companies have also been flattered by such imitators as McDnoalds, to say nothing of Apple’s recent and decidedly creepy discovery of an entire chain of replica Apple stores…

entry.title: Japan reactor shut down after malfunction
entry.summary: In a fresh blow to public confidence, a reactor in southern Japan went into automatic shutdown yesterday because of problems with its cooling system, clouding the outlook for an imminent restart of the country's idled nuclear plants. Kyushu Electric, the operator of the reactor at the Genkai nuclear power plant, characterized the incident as minor and said there was no risk of a radiation leak. A problem with the condenser unit that turns steam back into cooling water appeared to have triggered the halt, but the reactor stopped safely and was undergoing checks, the utility said. (boston.com)

entry.title: KDDI to sell new iPhone - Apple
entry.summary: Japan's second-largest mobile carrier KDDI will sell Apple's new iPhone, the California-based company said, ending rival operator Softbank's highly profitable reign as the sole provider in Japan. Shares of Softbank fell 2.3 percent in morning trade, while KDDI fell 0.5 percent and market leader NTT Docomo slid 1.4 percent. That compared with a 0.8 percent fall in the benchmark Nikkei average . The market response may have been muted by the fact that the reception for the iPhone 4S, unveiled on Tuesday in California, was lukewarm compared with the rapturous welcome sparked by previous models. (Reuters)

entry.title: Alice Nine reveals details on their upcoming single, “Niji no Yuki”
entry.content:
As tokyohive reported earlier, Alice Nine will be releasing a new single called “Niji No Yuki” on December 21st. The band recently revealed new details on their upcoming song, which was said to be a ballad composed by vocalist Shou.

It was also revealed that the song will be released in three different versions: limited edition A, limited edition B (which will include a DVD), and a regular edition.

Check out the track lists below!

–

<Limited Edition A>
[CD]
1. Niji no Yuki
2. NEMESIS
[DVD]
1. Niji no Yuki MUSIC CLIP
2. MUSIC CLIP MAKING
3. Senkou (Live at “7th THEATER” 2011.9.9)

<Limited Edition B>
[CD]
1. Niji no Yuki
2. NEMESIS
[DVD]
1. I. (Live at “7th THEATER” 2011.9.9)
2. Fuurin (Live at “7th THEATER” 2011.9.9)
3. GEMINI (Live at “7th THEATER” 2011.9.9)

<Regular Edition>
[CD]
1. Niji no Yuki
2. NEMESIS
3. Yami ni Chiru Sakura (another version)

Source & Image: natalie + Alice Nine Official Site

category.term: Yamauchi Keisuke Oshigoto DVD ~ Sore Ike! Kei-chan! Hicchaku 2011 Natsu ~

entry.title: Yamauchi Keisuke to release documentary DVD in November
entry.content:
It’s been revealed that enka singer Yamauchi Keisuke will be releasing his first documentary DVD, “Yamauchi Keisuke Oshigoto DVD ~ Sore Ike! Kei-chan! Hicchaku 2011 Natsu ~“, on November 14th.

The DVD will mainly revolve around his regular radio program on Nippon Broadcast, “Anata to Happy!“, and will feature off-shot clips the singer challenging himself to billiards and darts. This DVD was made to answer his fan’s demands saying, “I want to see how Kei-chan revolves around his radio show.”

Yamauchi promoted his work with, “I want those in areas that couldn’t listen to me on the radio to enjoy it.” Additionally, regarding his latest single, “Fuyugare no Viola“, which ranked 13th in the Oricon Single Ranking, he commented, “I will do my best for many people to listen to my new song.”

The DVD will be available for purchase from Nippon Broadcast Rakuraku Ticket.

Source: Sanspo

** “Chaku-Uta Full” is the synonym for a complete digital single.

08/(00) “NEW WORLD” – Sandaime J Soul Brothers
09/(04) “CRAZY FOR YOU” – Kylee
10/(00) “TASUKI” – Wakadanna

** “Chaku-Uta” are short versions (30~40 seconds long) of songs that can easily be used as ringtones (truetone). They are usually encoded in MP3, AAC, and other similar formats.
